answers.answer: Yeah I would esp with the elevated BP readings and the headaches.  They may want to monitor you because of that.  Please call your OB.

YES!  You must see a doctor.  This value is in the hypertensive range which could be dangerous for you and baby.  Preeclampsia which is a life-threatening condition needs to be ruled out too.Either call your doctor immediately or head to the ER or L&D.  This is something that requires medication attention NOW.
I think halucinations are enough to see a doctor.....

question: right, im 30 weeks +3been having bad ha;ucinations for days so done blood pressure and it read 149/89 and pulse was 110considored high enough to see a doctor?
title: high blood pressure ?
